website_summaries.verdict: It won't work for everyone, but it's an attractive bag that's as versatile as it is good-looking. A suitable pick for travelers who need extra space for accessories instead of numerous suits, pants, or shirts.
pros: Unique structure allows you to roll it up like a duffel bag once it's packed
Can be used as a carry on
Has side compartment for small items, and the opposite side can fit a pair of shoes
Back flap easily fits over other luggage pieces
cons: Fits less clothing than traditional garment bags
Zippers and straps have been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheaply made. I’ve used this bag three times now and it has a broken zipper. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: alexander small

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a garment bag that I could carry on the plane with me and that could hold at least 2 uniform sets with boots/shoes. This bag works great. A little tight but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mig A.

customer_reviews.title: However I have fit in it currently 2x Levi’s jeans 7x T-shirt’s 5x button up long sleeved shirts 5x briefs 8x smart wool ankle socks 1x 5’x3’ microfiber towel 2x regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t experienced the waterproof part yet, but I doubt it is. However I have fit in it currently 2x Levi’s jeans 7x T-shirt’s 5x button up long sleeved shirts 5x briefs 8x smart wool ankle socks 1x 5’x3’ microfiber towel 2x regular ties 3x bolo ties 1x complete shower roll up 1x flip flops 1x Chuck Taylor’s I can still fit more in there. It doesn’t look overstuffed at all. Zips well everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for business travelers!
customer_reviews.text: In case you were wondering...this bag has lots of space. I put in enough clothes (in the garment bag section) for 2 days and still had room for more. When I zipped it together there is still loads of room for shoes and toiletries. I travel for work so lightweight and roomy are important. This bag checks all of the boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Impressive - holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly in the 1st picture that I posted this bag is holding 4 hang up shirts 4 pair of cargo pants, 2 pair of jeans, sweatpants, PJs, undergarments and a sweater. Wow..... The only issue that I had was it was a little hard for me to zip up the sides but I think it's just because it's an unusual design but I'm pretty impressed with quality and overall how it works.
customer_reviews.author: iBm

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality bag. No loose threads. There is a place to hang a suit jacket and there is clips on the bottom so that the bottom of the suit and the folded suit sleeves won’t slide around during transport. Lots of pockets to compartmentalize your travel items. It’s not goint to be pristine after being in the bag but the amount of wrinkling is very minimal. All the zippers seem to work. My bag didn’t come with a strap But the customer service was great and they sent a replacement right away
customer_reviews.author: FaithHopeLove

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY penny!  Only regret you'll have is the regret of not getting this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I was in a wedding where travel was involved. This is hands down amazing!!! I was able to transport my bridesmaid and rehearsal dinner dresses, shoes plus soo much more. It easily fit in the overhead bins on the planes and was easy to carry with the shoulder strap. The pocket to attach to my luggage was awesome once I picked up my checked bag. The quality of this bag was more than I had expected. Would recommend this a million times over again. Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: peanut31

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I came across this bag on YouTube. The bag feels very durable. I’m so excited to use it on my upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: GreedyReader

customer_reviews.title: Incredible travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I have used many travel bags but none is like this. This is the coolest bag I've ever had. You can perfectly fit a complete suit, shirt, vest and tie. It is possible to place shoes, accessories, magazines and other things. This bag complies with the size recommended by most airlines for hand luggage (carry on)
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Lost but Found Shoulder Strap - Spacious Bag
customer_reviews.text: Updating my original review because I thought I received a bag w/out a shoulder strap. That was not true since I realized later that the strap fell out when I was opening the bag and it was under the bed. I look forward to using the bag next week for a trip and I should easily be able to fit a weekend worth of clothes including multiple outfits per day. I also want to note that the company contacted me within 24 hours when they thought I was missing a shoulder strap. The customer service was great and I like that they pay attention to their product reviews and want to make things right with the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for uniforms
customer_reviews.text: This bag if packed correctly fits soooo much stuff. I put in two uniform, uniform jacket, two sets of shoes, cover, 5 days of shirts/socks, workout gear, two books, a jump rope, and a speakertbos were just the big items. It can get heavy depending on what you pack. But I took my uniforms out of the bag and put them on no wrinkles after 11hr flight, plus 2 hrs of car/metro travel. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Defective strap
customer_reviews.text: Liked the bag but the very first time I used it the strap hook fell apart. Would be a good bag if the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Functional, easy to use, and durable
customer_reviews.text: I used it to carry my tux internationally for a wedding. My tux arrived ready to wear and the compartment for the shoes, bow tie, and accessories is amazing. The first couple of uses the zipper on the ends can be difficult to close, but once it’s been a used it becomes easier. I would strongly recommend this bag. It is very durable and fits as a carrry on.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Ubaque

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately the garment portion of the bad is too small for my summer uniform that includes ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and doesn’t have a cheap feel to it. I’m in the military and in my current position I travel a lot, unfortunately the garment portion of the bag is too small for my summer uniform Which includes a button up shirt and trousers. I don’t see how I’m going to fit my winter uniform which is suit without it getting wrinkle. I’m 5’10” and wear a size M.
customer_reviews.author: Tanque

customer_reviews.title: Held together wonderfully for the 1 trip I have taken it on
customer_reviews.text: Fit 3 dresses and a Jean jacket in the garment part plus a few other outfits rolled into the bag. Held together wonderfully for the 1 trip I have taken it on. Only issue would be the zippers on the side take some time to get used to zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Not so great. Quality and size issues.
customer_reviews.text: Was ok, not great. Was not wide enough to fit my 46R suit without having to fold the shoulders in. Honestly, it was not even close so not sure how it was possible for someone else to fit a 44R suit, let alone two. Other than that, it’s a neat idea but not well executed. The zippers don’t stay closed, don’t have and endtype place to fit/stick so I had to keep closing them throughout travel. Also - the little anti-slide pegs on the bottom fell off way too easily. One when I slid the bag off a car seat and another I have no idea when. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I am really feeling this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am really feeling this bag! The grey pattern is very good looking. The bag feels well built. And it has surprisingly more room than I was expecting! For the price, this is a homerun! There are also a bunch of clutch little pockets hidden throughout the bag. I have a grey backpack for work, and this is going to go perfectly with it. I am completely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Ancelmo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zippers and a no-go on dresses
customer_reviews.text: The zipper that holds everything together at the top split apart immediately. Also, this will not fit dresses.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. The video gave a true and accurate description of what this bag offers. Needed it for a short stay in Savannah, Georgia to attend a wedding. We were able to fit a men's suit jacket, dress shirt & two pair of dress slacks, two semi-formal dresses, a pair of men's shoes & some toiletries. And there was still room for more. LOVE the design & how it rolls up & the material it's made of. Our clothing was wrinkle free;Our flight was hassle free-as there was no issue to carry on plane. Would purchase again for myself or for a gift. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag...holds a week's worth of clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was able to pack 1 suit, 5 shirts, 2 pairs of pants, two sets of clippers, 2 ties, 1 belt, and underwear, undershirts and socks for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, poor workmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected great quality and fantastic workmanship. This bag will compliment my rolling hard suitcases. *** Update*** I took this bag as a carry-on for a wedding. The shoulder strap broke at the connection and one of the four pegs on the bottom for legs didn't make it off the plane. It was holding one man's suit and one not a suit, only! It wasn't used as a duffle, which you can do with the space it has when all zipped up. I'm disappointed with the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag, Strap Broke on First Use
customer_reviews.text: The bag is actually a great concept and done well. I just recently went on a trip where I brought 2 suits, 1 pair dress shoes, 3 dress pants, 3 dress shirts, 3 t-shirts and underwear, 3 pair of socks and bathroom items. The only problem was that 1 hour into the very first trip the metal part of the strap broke and I had to tie it for the rest of the trip. Pros: - Good Concept - Good room - Nice separate compartment for shoes and other - Seems to be good quality Con's - Strap broke on first use (within 1 hour)
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sling broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing this product in May of 2019 I have used this for 2 occasions, on the second use the sling broke off while walking through the airport. Now I'm past the return window point. The overall craftsmanship and quality of the bag also looks cheap. The stitch marks and lose thread throughout the bag is also visible. This bag cannot hold more than just 1 suit, dress shirt, tie and pair of shoes. Anything more, it will get creased and you sling will break. Personally, a duffle bag size that only light weight amounts of things for travel is a useless bag.
customer_reviews.author: URDUNSON

customer_reviews.title: This bad easily holds 2 suits and had room to spare ...
customer_reviews.text: This bad easily holds 2 suits and had room to spare for an extra pair of shoes about 4 shirts, underwear toiletries and a rather thick Hoodie. The zippers were a little stiff the first time around but I resolved this by spraying them with just a few drops of wd40 and letting it dry outside to loose the chemical smell. It also packs up to a surprisingly small size enough to fit in a briefcase. Haven't been able to determine just how durable the material is but so far it seems like a worth while investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busted zipper ruined the entire bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag has five zippers total to hold close everything. My bag arrived with a busted zipper and so I had to travel with the potential of stuff falling out of my bag, if a single zipper does not work properly, then it ruins the entire bag. I bought the bag in hopes that I could travel with a suit, but it wrinkles the suit and dress shirts anyway so it begs the question of why would you just purchase a hard shell travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and wrinkled suit
customer_reviews.text: While I was initially excited about using this bag for upcoming business travel, I soon was disappointed. Suits and shirts get very wrinkled. The bag is also challenging to use on the go. You cannot open the bag without all of the contents coming out so changing at the airport is borderline impossible. The quality is poor (but decent for the price) and the bag has already started to fall apart after one week of use. The tie and shoe compartments are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ml10

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a garment bag for men's suit and shirts for airline travel. It was smaller than expected. The suit did not fit inside without folding. I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wilt Shandor

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small
customer_reviews.text: Coats don't fit too well within the given space for the bag. This bag would be better if you could fit one shoe on either side. Instead, this company decided to make one large pocket to fit both your shoes on one side only. It seems to take up a lot more space than necessary inside the bag itself. This is a cheap knock off of the Ultimate Garment Bag by Stitch Golf. If you can afford that bag, I recommend investing your money there. I've used this Modoker bag a few times on flights over 5hrs and I should have spent more money on a better quality bag.....maybe one with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Four days worth of clothes with room to spare!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we are so impressed by this little tardis of a bag. It fit four days worth of business attire PLUS casual clothing AND souvenirs AND size 13 shoes! Not to mention the endless number of pockets (to spare) to keep everything organized. The toiletries bag was super cute, and fit in perfectly too. We love the zippered toothbrush holders on both sides and easily wipeable nylon material inside. The zippers were easy to zip, but do become unaligned if you rush through it. Simple fix! Just start off slowly and make sure the sides are clicked together before closing the main top zipper. Once everything is zipped-up the bag feels sturdy and securely closed. The zippers are well stitched.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Modoker contacted me after my original review and replaced the torn bag with a new one. Based on the customer service I am raising the rating to four stars. If the bag handles another trip without any damage I’ll raise it to five stars and assume the original bag was an anomaly. Original: I took this on a trip to New Orleans and the stitching on outer pocket/sleeve tore during that first trip. This is the sleeve that can be zipped up to be a pocket or unzipped to hold the duffle on top of a rolling luggage. The design of the bag is otherwise pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised that this bag worked so well at keeping my suit wrinkle free, even when it was checked at the gate. Unfortunately, one of the bottom pieces on the bag broke off after only five months, but when I emailed Modoker they said that they would immediately send a replacement bag. Hopefully the next one will last longer! It's really an excellent, light weight bag that can fit a ton of stuff and carries a suit really well. I love the adjustable strap and it's very stylish. I also love that it is collapsible and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: So So for my application
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry my dress shirt and slacks to the gym in the morning to keep things reasonably pressed instead of trying to fold up a starched shirt in a gym bag. Unfortunately the bag has very little "structure" and rigidity to it so it just slops around and collapses in my car and in a locker. When on my shoulder with the strap is bows in half. The bag in the ad photo must be stuffed to the max to hold that shape.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, good shape after a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought two of these for my teenage sons to use when they travel to speech and debate tournaments, which require them to wear suits. They are great. Holds 2 suits for each, (and my sons are 6’1” and 6’ so man size suits), dress shoes, ties, socks and casual clothes and toiletries with no problem. Rolls up great and is easy to carry. Great purchase for us, have had them a year now and they are in good condition. Wrinkling of the suits is not noticeable/nonexistent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good design, ok quality.  Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The design of this garment bag is great, and even fits two suits plus shirts and other accessories. However, I've used this bag three times and already one side of the strap is broken, and even more annoyingly, the top main zipper has broken teeth, making it very difficult to close and open. Of course this happened just after the return window. UPDATE - Modoker reached out to me and shipped a replacement bag free. I appreciate the good customer service wanting to make things right! It looks like the strap design has been updated so hopefully it will not break, but if it does, the bag comes with a 12 month warranty.
customer_reviews.author: jbetts1790

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Used this to travel for a wedding. Had my sons suit and a very light dress in it. The dress was wrinkled on the bottom because it was “too long” I’m 5’y and the dress is above my knees. Suit arms were wrinkled pretty bad. Had to borrow a steamer. Also the wire hangers (2) - had to “fold” them down to make it work. Zippers are a little tricky. Wish it had “feet”. Also I had to lay in on the bed after I took everything out. You can’t “hang” it. I love the concept of it. I’ll use it again but maybe just as a duffle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Czubinski

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out ..
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this bag , as it looks nice and seems well built . The idea is great , but the execution ???? Put your hanging clothes in first and zip up ... then add everything else . Its tricky to zip it up Then when you want a hanging item , you have to basically dump out the whole bag to get to it .... Tough time recommending this one , although Im still trying !!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Great garment and overnight bag!
customer_reviews.text: *the pictures were taken immediately after a flight where the bag was checked!* This bag can easily be a couple days of clothes, toiletries, shoes, and of course work/dress attire. It's wrinkle protection is not as good as my large, bulky, inconvenient garment bag. But that minor difference is more than made up for with the portability of this smart design. The bag can easily be used as a carry-on. (I bought this item based on a recommendation from a friend, he loved his. I love mine!)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Durable, carry-on size, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag because I was going to be travelling alot of work interviews. I wanted something not too expensive, durable, and small enough to fit under the seat on an airplane. So far I am very happy with my purchase. It was a little larger than I thought, but I was able to fit it under my seat on the airplane. (I wanted it to be my personal item for United's Basic Economy.) The zippers are metal. Strap is comfortable. My one criticism is the adjustable strap will not stay at the length I need, but I'm sure I can rig it so it will. Overall I am very happy with my purchase for the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but the zipper is very hard to start and catches the fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't yet used this on a trip, but I checked it out after it arrived and it seems like a great idea. The issue I have is that it is very difficult to get the zipper started and it also catches the fabric if you are not very careful. I had a very hard time getting it to release the fabric once it got caught in the zipper. I was sure it was going to tear but, after spending a very long time on it, I did finally get the fabric out of the zipper without any damage. This is a pretty bad design flaw and I don't recommend purchase due to that.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and keeps your clothes wrinkle free but.... If you're a frequent traveler, walking miles thru airports, to the car rental area, etc... the last thing you need is to be slugging around a heavy piece of luggage. It's a great product but because you need to hand carry it or use the sling to put it over your shoulder it quickly becomes heavy and difficult to manage. I'd recommend to the manufacturer to consider a backpack version or a version that incorporates wheels. This would help travelers from dealing with the weight and load...
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Fit my purpose; your mileage may vary
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I can keep a spare suit in my car at all times. I like that I can keep the tie, dress and undershirt, socks and shoes all together and can easily remove from the car if I am going on vacation or away for the weekend and definitely won’t need a suit for work. All that being said, I am skeptical about whether this would hold up under the strain of a full load for a long period of time. If it’s going to be longer than a weekend trip, I would not risk making this my sole or primary bag. The plastic strap is cheap looking, but otherwise the materials looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: WVLWYR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concept, makes a great weekender bag!
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this bag overall. It holds a good amount of stuff, and is built to last. The built in garment bag is a really cool idea that works quite well. I wish I had known about this when I was traveling a lot doing job interviews, it would have made bringing my suit with me way easier! Didn't ship with a shoulder strap, but I got in touch with the company and they had a new one to me in a very timely manner. Makes packing fun!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bag for traveling..read on!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that you can put a few things on hangers, then add your toiletries and spaces for a pair f shoes, then roll up sides like a duffel shape and add your folded items. We went to a weekend wedding, didn't want the hassle of checked luggage, and suit, nice dress, shoes and plenty of jams, day time tees fits great. This is my second purchase for ur son as he is always borrowing ours! After you figure out how you want to use it, you will love this! Small amount of money for easing travel packing.
customer_reviews.author: Big Momma

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a suit bag for a 3 day trip, and was intrigued by this product. I was pleasantly surprised at how much else I could fit in addition to the suit & a couple shirts & ties. But to handle everything I needed which included shoes, some casual shirts, toiletries, and a few other things, I wasn't quite able to avoid the need for a small duffel bag in addition to this. The bag itself and the zippers all seem well made, and I was very pleased that it kept the suit almost entirely wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I had to attend a formal meeting in Tokyo, one that required me to wear a suit. My smallish suitcase would have left my suit a wrinkly mess; the meeting was the day after arrival, so no time to get the suit pressed, either. So I bought one of these bags, and it worked out beautifully. There was room for my suit, shirt, tie, dress shoes etc AND my wife's dress AND room left over for random other stuff. Checked the main suitcase, kept this as carry-on and attended the meeting with nary a wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Twark Main

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: I personally like this bag. It not gonna completely keep you clothes wrinkle free but it’s a good way to fit 2 suit jackets some shirt/pants. Then you can zip it up in a roll and you get space inside for some shoes, ties or other accessories so it’s better than just carrying a garment bag. The material in the outside is stylish so it’s a nice looking bag. The inside not quite, you can tell it was made in factory in China just buy the stitching, can’t really explain but overall I enjoy this bag and you can bring it on as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Vetyaz

customer_reviews.title: Images are very misleading
customer_reviews.text: The images for this "garment bag" are VERY misleading. If you're looking to bring one suit, one pair of dress shoes, and a change of clothes, MAYBE you can fit it all in. Once you put your shoes in that pocket, most of your space is gone. I'm still trying to figure out how to keep the hanger from sticking out. Do NOT buy this if you're planning on going anywhere more than a night or two... unless you plan on doing your laundry where you're going or you plan on wearing the same clothes over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently for work, and have been amazed by this product. Anyone who travels for business knows that bringing checked luggage is an absolute rookie move. With this carry on, I can fit two suits, four shirts, an extra pair of shoes, undershirts, underwear, and toiletries. This is just enough for four-day stints on the road and in the air. The zippers stick a bit if the bag is over- or under-filled, but after a bit of time they get a bit more pliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sir E.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag for suits and in general
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag for 4 separate trips and it’s held up very well. The bag has held up to 3 suits and several dress shirts. I’ve found my suits are usually wrinkle free but any dress shirts I’ve traveled with usually need to be ironed/steamed. The bag has a large carrying capacity (more than I would have guessed). It’s also small enough to be used as a carry on bag with no issues. I’ll definitely be using the bag a lot more than my original bulky suit bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I had a wedding to attend with multiple wardrobe changes over the weekend. This handled 2 suits and a sport coat, plus once rolled up it took a pair of shoes, a few t-shirts, boxers, socks, a book, my tablet and my dopp-kit. It was all a little over packed at that point but it handled it perfectly. The handles are very secure when snapped. The shoulder strap was comfortable. And the slot to allow the handle of your roller bag to slip through worked great. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: How to use it?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as it looked very nice and useful. I found two clips inside the back attached to the bottom of the carry on and cannot find out what it is used for or how to use it. I thought Modoker’s website would give info on it but it’s not the case. So I guess I just have to guess until I come across a video or something.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but not great. Makes for a good amount of wrinkles and some stress in zipping.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea a lot but the execution may not work so well. It's pretty difficult to get all of it zipped closed for carrying, and it's kind of a pain to carry with the thinness of the strap. However, it does hold a ton of stuff: 3 dress shirts, 2 slacks, 1 blazer, and then a bunch of casual clothes. It does wrinkle many of the items on the outside but I don't know that this can be prevented. Zipping is stress-inducing, especially if you end up in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: adhrutgers

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I thought we would give this one a go since it was on sale one day- upset that we did because the strap broke on our return trip home. Nothing heavy was put in the bag (a suit, pair of shoes and some toiletries) skip this bag and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: cwebbTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a recent trip to Brazil. It is the perfect size as a carry-on. I was able to carry a suit jacket in the zipper compartment. It has clips to hold the jacket to prevent it from wrinkling and plenty of additional compartments to keep glasses, phone charger, and earbuds accessible. Someone spilled water on the airplane and I was happy to find that the water did not penetrate into the bag or bleed the material. I am very pleased with the size and weight of the bag. Very good quality and a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kraynak

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles suits
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks great and has tons of pockets. You can fit quite a bit of clothes and stuff in it. However, my suits and shirts get really badly wrinkled from it. Kind of defeats the purpose of just stuffing them in a roller bag. Also, the zipper failed the second time I used it. I was able to back the zipper up and close the hole but I doubt it will last a long time but it’s a $40 bag so I get it. The suit being wrinkled despite proper folding is what bothers me the most
customer_reviews.author: El Si

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband as he was taking a short business trip and I didn't want him to fold his sport coat. When it arrived I must say both of us looked at the bag and thought this is going to be a disaster lol. But to both of our surprise the bag is awsome. Everything fit for his 3 day trip.he was shocked it went through TSA without issue. Oh and it fit in the overhead bin perfectly. Upon arriving to his meeting straight from the airport he was excited to find his coat didn't have on wrinkle. Wonderful bag...
customer_reviews.author: Dywanda Hyder

customer_reviews.title: The Designer Is A Genius!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was kind enough to upgrade my original purchase with their newest navy blue model, and it is fantastic! It is amazing that any one garment bag could do so much and handle so much. The quality is terrific. You could easily pack clothes for four days. This is going to be my go to favorite bag. The best way to tell you is through photos with captions of it in action. I would definitely recommend this bag and the seller. Both will live up to your expectations. As an aside, I had the photos uploaded in an order that made sense, but Amazon mixed them all up. Oh well, at least you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I like
customer_reviews.text: Great bag overall. I use it as a carry on, overnight bag and gym bag. I’m in the military so it’s nice to have an appropriately professional bag to travel with. It fits my full utility uniform (and boots) and a second set of clothes be it a gym outfit (with shoes) or a business set, with room for more. I do not particularly like how the shoulder strap slips and twists but I think I’ve managed to get that to stay put by trapping the adjuster in the shoulder pad. I also don’t love that the bag itself does not have its own door hook so you need to use your hanger or the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Gym 2 Work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is always on the lookout for a good bag that will help him get from the gym to work quickly and keep his clothes looking nice. So far he has been very pleased with this gift and it looks really nice too.
customer_reviews.author: KGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great!
customer_reviews.text: I tested this with a trial run, folding my shirts, pants, and shorts ad if I was going on a 3-4 day trip. I even threw in some shoes, not to mention a suit. I left it parked for a few days and moved it around my apartment periodically. The suit came out just the same way it went in. It may replace my regular carry on. There was enough space to throw in a laptop (with case) and a couple of electronics. I recommend using some packing cubes or pouch for cables if you do that though.
customer_reviews.author: Neil E

customer_reviews.title: No Wheels.  Carry it like your kid.
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. Holds a ton of stuff. No wheels. A definite shoulder carry item. Not sure if you could get two weeks worth of capacity for the business traveler. Definitely one week to ten days of garments should work well. That also depends on your clothing sizes and weights. There were lots of instructions available for the product which is a plus. It is much lighter than a garment bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tpr. Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about some reviews, but did not need to be. This bag easily carries a suit, a couple shirts and cloths for a couple days. It is not a replacement for a suitcase for a 5 day trip. It easily carried my suit, pair of jeans and a couple shirts and daily wear items. Even had room to slide my toiletries in also Just do not over stuff it and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Diver43

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best garment bag I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've packed for a week long trip with three pairs of shoes (I wear a size 10.5 US) and still had room for more things if I needed them. This bag fits perfectly in the overhead bins or under the seat in front of you on a plan with room for your feet. Easily the best bag I have ever traveled with. The only gripe I have is the adjuster on the shoulder strap loosens as you walk with it unless you put it on the opposite side of the shoulder pad.
customer_reviews.author: Russ ZThree

customer_reviews.title: Great weekender bag
customer_reviews.text: So far ive used it for two trips where i needed to carry a suit. First trip was a 3-day weekend and all i need was this bag. Second trip was for 5 days and i took this bag and a backpack. The shoe partition was able to fit my dress shoes, sandals and water shoes (Size US mens 12). I havent figured it out yet but apparently if you carry by the handles the garment wont wrinkle, when the shoulder strap is used its wrinkle city
customer_reviews.author: D.M

customer_reviews.title: Less than great for air travel* Edited
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at just how much this bag could hold. I liked the idea of the side pocket for shoes. Unfortunately it was very hard to travel with by plane because it was a little bigger than expected, the strap tended to slip while walking (it would lengthen and I had to stop repeatedly to shorten the strap again) and one of the zippers broke the first time I used it. So disappointed! **The company contacted me and offered me a full refund. They have great Customer Service. I was very appreciative of the communication from this company.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Military Dress Uniforms
customer_reviews.text: Bought to transport my Dress Blues for a military function. The bag held my blues and all accouterments securely, and they were perfectly wearable the next day after having been in the bag almost 24hrs. Plus, it still had room for my travel shave kit and a change of civilian clothes. My only complaint is that the clips on the sides that hold the whole thing closed have a little too much slack, and the side zippers can start to creep open, but never open all the way. Overall definitely recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick getaway that has a Dressy night in store
customer_reviews.text: This bag is GREAT!!! I only gave 3 stars because my husband's shirt did need to be ironed, however, the next time we travel I will place his shirt in a plastic bag you get from the dry-cleaners to see if that helps with the wrinkling. But seriously a GREAT bag. You can fit a lot in, and your shoes won't get everything dirty because they have their own cubby!!! Again... GREAT bag!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat B

customer_reviews.title: Great Weekender Bag
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bag for a few months, and traveled to 17 different states with it, so I feel like I can write a thorough review: First off, I have gotten nothing but compliments on this bag. I love the versatility and its aesthetic. It's definitely my quick travel bag. Pros: It's excellent for a weekend travel bag and has plenty of compartments for all your accessories. Suitcase slit on the side to secure it to your suitcase, or treat it as a zip pocket Very stylish. Durable. Cons: Waterproof=Kinda. The material is waterproof but the zippers on the side do not create a seal on the bag. There are still openings where rain/liquids can seep in.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Campos

customer_reviews.title: Worked as Described and was Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the money and very spacious. It has quite a few things that make it worth 5 stars... the ability to keep your suit in a reasonable compartment that is safe and can store other items as well (like shoes and toiletries). It was a bit harder to carry for long sprints down an airport terminal if you packed it heavily, as it doesn't have rollers or anything. Overall super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling on business interviews because it was inexpensive and held a suit. Would have been better using the backpack I was using before. Flew 60 times in 2 months with my suit and shirts. Awkward to travel with- too large for most overhead bins on airplanes. Suit and shirts were wrinkled after every flight and needed to be seriously ironed when I pulled them out. Also in order to get your suit & shirts out, you need to unpack the ENTIRE bag. Zipper broke after 4 flights. Cheap price, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: ER Doc

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything a woman could possibly need
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag! I couldn't wait until my next trip, so I packed it up just for fun. I managed to fit 3 pairs of scrubs in the garment bag part - side note, plastic hangers might break inside, but that isn't the bag's fault - as well as 9 outfits, 3 pairs of flat shoes (women's size 7), a tens unit with spare electrodes, charging cables, all my toiletries, nail care tools and 4 bottles of polish, and 4 medication bottles (and a partridge in a pear tree). After that I still had a bit of room in the bag for stuff but began having trouble finding things to put in it. I definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Gave this 5 stars! Easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag! I was able to pack enough for a 5 day trip! I used the side zip bad to roll up 4 pair of jeans! I did not need that space for shoes so that was a plus. I hung 5 shirts on wire hangers and then we I got to my destination I just hung them up and they weren’t wrinkled either. This was a great purchase! I had plenty of room for everything thing else like hair drier and Necessities
customer_reviews.author: Animal House

customer_reviews.title: Gym bag that everyone will ask about
customer_reviews.text: I'm 8 months in, and this bag has held up to being tossed in the car, tossed in the gym locker, and just generally tossed everywhere. It was a lightning deal, so I haven't treated it with any respect. Fortunately, it's been fine with that. Some notes on capacity: I am 5'7" and 145'ish lbs. 29x30 pants medium shirts on a hanger size 9 shoes in the shoe compartment I fit all of the above + towel and misc toiletries in this bag with room to spare
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Much better than anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Tokyo and didn't want to travel with too much so I broke it down <Modoker Garment bag> and stowed it in my rolling check-in. On the way back, I used it as a second check-in and fit up to 5 packing cubes of clothes, 2 jackets (in the special jacket compartment), along with shoes, thus freeing up an entire suitcase for plenty of Japanese whiskey and enough Hentai ****** to last me a year!
customer_reviews.author: Bico F.

customer_reviews.title: Broke the third time I used it
customer_reviews.text: The design is very creative, and the idea behind it is great if you travel a lot. Unfortunately the zippers are cheap and prone to breaking. It arrived with a broken zipper pull so closing was a problem. Things got worse on a trip when two of the zippers broke and I couldn't fix them well enough for the bag to survive the trip home. I was forced to find a luggage store and buy an entirely new bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: The bag works well but the shoulder strap broke the first time I tried it out. I brought it to Orangetheory with my suit, heels, towels, and shower sundries. If the strap was still intact this bag would be perfect. I brought it with my on a plane about a month later having forgotten about the strap -- big mistake. It is quite cumbersome to carry by the handles especially when heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J. VanDusen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Modoker Garment bag 15 minutes ago, I had to test it. I put 5 t-shirts on their plastic hangers, 2 jeans, 1 shoes, and my toiletries bag. There is plenty of room for underwear, socks and more. I will have to get wire hangers for my shirts. You can easily fit 2 pair of shoes in the shoe compartment. Probably will buy another for my daughter, we travel together. Zippers are tricky, I guess I'll get use to it. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Felix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag on 4 trips so far and has worked well for me. Shirts do get a bit wrinkled in the garment bag portion, but suits have been fine and had not required pressing after traveling in the bag. I like the separate side shoe compartment. Although I saw a couple of reviews with complaints about the Zippers, they are holding up well so far for me. Awesome bag so far.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN F LOAM

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for those who travel or have to carry a suit/uniform
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to carry his military uniform in and it couldn’t have been more perfect! It actually fits a total of 2 pairs of shoes. A uniform, suit and extra space for packing a change of clothes. If you are in the military and constantly have to take your uniform in for inspection and tired of the regular old garment zipper bag, invest in one of these! Game changer! Best of all it has a sleek design and made with great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Sayviseth

customer_reviews.title: Not great for airport travel.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this bag, but it’s just unrealistic. Still wrinkles. I think if you used it as a small carry on and did not actually use the duffle for more than anything but shoes and toiletries it may work. Not ideal for plan travel. I wasn’t looking for a carry on I could put my suit in and pack a weekend bag but it’s not really big enough. Also tiring carrying through the airport. Need wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Comyns

customer_reviews.title: Zippers are going to fail, it is not for "big and tall"
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted to work out in the gym in my office and this seemed like the perfect thing to transport my work clothes in. And I still think it could be. I wished they would upgrade the zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: First trip and no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for an overnight business trip where I need a sports coat and pants in the garment section. I was concerned I'd have a lot of wrinkles, but it wasn't bad at all. Only possible concern is that there is a bit of a gap where the zippers meeting, but I didn't have any issues. I think over the long-term the only issues will be how well the zippers hold up and how many nights I can get away with packing in this bag. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: PMD Gator

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Medical Residency Interviews!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for medical residency interview season. It kept my two suits largely wrinkle free for trips lasting around 3 weeks. I was also able to fit two pairs of dress shoes and a pair of snow boots in the shoe compartment during these trips! This bag held up well when used as a carry-on and when it was gate-checked. Super pleased with this purchase and recommended it to several friends already!
customer_reviews.author: Clara R

customer_reviews.title: Optimus Prime of Bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my destination wedding. I wanted to make sure that all wedding attire was with us at all times. The bag was shorter than I expected. However, I was able to hold my dress, my husband's entire suit, my shoes, his shoes, jewelry, and needed documents. And, there was room to spare. On our return home, it carried all of the same items plus souvenirs! The quality is top notch. I am so glad that I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany K

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but kind of cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag for its functionality. Overall, I'd recommend this bag, but don't care for the cheap fake leather on it, or the cheap internal plastic. I wish it was a bit more expense and that the quality was better. If it was, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ispendwaytoomuchonamazon

customer_reviews.title: great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write reviews, but this an excellent product! Very functional and well made. There was an issue with the strap, but customer service was prompt and outstanding. Would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Laccetti

customer_reviews.title: Great travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He’s used it for both a weekend and a week long trip. He carried this bag filled with his clothes and a backpack with his tablet and other personal/entertainment items. He said with the first use he wasn’t really a fan, but once he learned to pack for the bag he was converted. Probably only downside is limited shoe space, but he’s very into sneakers/shoes so I’m sure it’s fine for the average person. The bag does allow room for a pair of shoes, but one pair isn’t enough for him! Overall a good buy and I’m glad he’s enjoying his gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look, nice travel companion.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice. The fabric is nice. But I have used it twice in travel as a carry on and the shoulder strap has broken and the side pocket that opens to slide onto your luggage ripped the first time I used it. Update: The company saw this review and sent me another one with updated clasps on the sides. Thank you so much for your great customer service and nice bag!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Suit Bag for Flying
customer_reviews.text: I packed a suit, 2 shirts, dress shoes, my wife’s dress, and a few other odds and ends for a wedding in Greece. I used it as my carry- on. Everything looked fine when unpacked after 3 plane trips. When the wedding was over, the bag easily survived 3 ferry trips and 3 more plane trips back home. Lots of pockets and nicely slips over the handle of a roller bag. I can strongly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: DTuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling with suits! I had a work trip where I needed to take 4 blazers. I was able to get them all, along with a couple lightweight shirts hung up and rolled - no wrinkles when I arrived. The side pockets also allowed me to roll a pair of pants and also put a pair of flats. Used this as my carry on and it was perfect! One of my favorite purchases for work travel!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived on time and was very nicely packaged. The zippers feel sturdy and smooth. The fabric is soft to the touch, yet feels very durable. The handles feel strong and there are no immediate hot spots in the hand. The internal layout of the bag is very smartly designed; it is quite intuitive and I can definitely see myself putting this bag to good use. The seller was incredibly easy to work with, fantastic and prompt communication, and very friendly. I will consider Modoker again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: VERY useful 1 person, 2 day bag
customer_reviews.text: have to work with it ... get used to it. a lot of features to actually understand because this IS NEW and DIFFERENT. but if you take your time ... if you learn it ... it works. i would say IF you are over 6 foot and/or 190lbs (me) ... then your clothes (especially suit) MIGHT not fit well in here (mine just barely do - if i work careful to put them in).
customer_reviews.author: Derrick L

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, but it did allow me to not have to check a bag. It is kind of a pain to carry through the airport with another backpack, but not that bad. Items were wrinkled but not horribly. The real test will be to see how long it will last. I will come back in a year with an update on its longevity. It does look nice, carries garments, and fits in the carry-on.
customer_reviews.author: jes3

customer_reviews.title: Great For 3 Day Trip
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for a 3 day trip. It held a suit, sport coat, and some shirts. The bag seemed to prevent them from wrinkling. i was also able add some other small items to the bag like a book, toiletries and sweater which worked great. The only concern I had was with the side zipper that converts it into a duffle bag. When first zipping the bag up one of the zippers was pulling apart. I was able to unzip and reset the zipper so that both sides of the zipper held together. I did not have a problem with the side zipper after that.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J. DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Garbage quality
customer_reviews.text: The bag is gorgeous, the material is sturdy, and it looks like the picture. However, I used the bag ONCE and the side zipper completely broke, rendering the bag useless. This happened literally the very first time I used it and so the rest of my travels, I had to safety pin the bag together to prevent my belongings from falling out. I do not recommend you purchase this bag as its quality was absolute garbage. I would love to get a refund, and a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived and I was skeptical it could hold everything we needed it to. Needless to say, we fit 2 dress shirts, 2 suits, a dinner gown and a formal dress. Oh and did I mention my wife also put her formal shoes in the shoe bags?! Only thing I'd like to see different is additional alligator clips at the bottom (maybe 3 pairs?) so that multiple items will stay secure.
customer_reviews.author: osufijiben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, affordable, just what you needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to bring to a wedding instead of checking a bag, and it’s paid for itself in one round trip! You can fit a surprisingly large amount of clothes, shoes, and toiletries in the bag. There is even a side pocket that is protected, so you can place your shoes in it without worrying about dirtying your clothes. Had a friend ask for the link as soon as he saw me unzip the bag and pull my suit out. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: Used the bag last weekend for the first time. Had no issues. Plenty of spaci for everything I needed to take with me and my suit (most importantly) was wrinkle free. I like the fact that is perfect size for carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to attend a wedding across country. It’s incredibly well designed and actually quite spacious. It’s takes a little finesse to get some of the zippers started after packing, but nothing serious. It also looks a lot better and easier to carry than traditional garment bags. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, looks ok though
customer_reviews.text: I think it makes more sense to spend the money for a quality bag. I sent this back because the garment bag was too small for my 40L jacket. The bag doesnt look bag, but it's clearly made on the cheaper side. Outside of the size, my fear was that the bag just wouldnt stand the test of time. I travel often and would hate to be on the road and a bag falls apart. I think this bag is for someone who doesnt necessarily need quality materials. You get what you pay for. If you only need to use this every once in a while, it may be what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Millennial Shopper

product_meta.title: Convertible Garment Bag with Shoulder Strap, Modoker Carry on Garment Duffel Bag for Men Women - 2 in 1 Hanging Suitcase Suit Travel Bags
feature_bullets: TWO BAG IN ONE MODOKER BAG; With the fancy design of combining the feature of Garment Bag and Duffel Bag, Modoker Garment Duffel Bag is not only a Overnight Travel Weekender Bag, but also a great Duffel Hanging Clothes Bag. It is a solid choice for who heading for a business trips or weekend getaway.

NO WRINKLE - HANGING GARMENT BAG; While open this Modoker Garment Bag and lay it out, it can be a great hanging garment bags for travel. With this Modoker Hanging Garment Bag, you can have a wrinkle-free suit or dress at any given time. No Wrinkles Trouble Your Dress or Suits Any More.

45L DUFFEL BAG; After assembled, this garment duffel bag work perfect as a 45L duffel bag/travel weekender bag. At the left side pocket of this garment bag is a shoes pouch. And the right side pocket is designed for passport, keys and some other small items.

CARRY ON GARMENT BAG; Garment Bag Dimension: 37.5”L x 20.8”W, 45L Duffel Bag Dimension: 22.8”L x 11”W x 11.8”H; Weight: 2.5 pounds. This soft- sided garment bag meet the require of sizer at the airport (Length + Width + Height: up to 51 inches / 130 cm). So this Modoker Garment Duffel Bag can be taken as your carry on luggage item.

WATER-RESISTANT DUFFEL BAG; Using high quality Polyester Fiber & Jacquard, this garment bag is scratch-resistant, anti-tear & anti water splashing. Included is a detachable shoulder strap, so it can be shoulder bag if needed. The detachable shoulder strap is adjustable to make this garment bag fits your shoulder well.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,976 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
